manageDataPage.title: Manage data
manageDataPage.description: Manage data local storage or Import your existing data into AppFlowy. You can secure your data with end to end encryption.

dataStorage.title: File storage location
dataStorage.tooltip: The location where your files are stored

resetDialog.title: Are you sure?
resetDialog.description: Resetting the path to the default data location will not delete your data. If you want to re-import your current data, you should copy the path of your current location first.

importData.title: Import data
importData.tooltip: Import data from AppFlowy backups/data folders
importData.description: Copy data from an external AppFlowy data folder and import it into the current AppFlowy data folder

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.tooltip: Manage how your data is stored and encrypted
encryption.descriptionNoEncryption: Turning on encryption will encrypt all data. This can not be undone.

dialog.title: Encrypt all your data?
dialog.description: Encrypting all your data will keep your data safe and secure. This action can NOT be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?

cache.title: Clear cache
cache.description: If you encounter issues with images not loading or fonts not displaying correctly, try clearing your cache. This action will not remove your user data.

dialog.title: Are you sure?
dialog.description: Clearing the cache will cause images and fonts to be re-downloaded on load. This action will not remove or modify your data.

menu.selfEncryptionLogoutPrompt: Are you sure you want to log out? Please ensure you have copied the encryption secret

menu.cloudURLHint: Input the base URL of your server
menu.cloudWSURLHint: Input the websocket address of your server
menu.restartAppTip: Restart the application for the changes to take effect. Please note that this might log out your current account
menu.changeServerTip: After changing the server, you must click the restart button for the changes to take effect
menu.enableEncryptPrompt: Activate encryption to secure your data with this secret. Store it safely; once enabled, it can't be turned off. If lost, your data becomes irretrievable. Click to copy
menu.inputEncryptPrompt: Please enter your encryption secret for
menu.configServerGuide: After selecting `Quick Start`, navigate to `Settings` and then "Cloud Settings" to configure your self-hosted server.
menu.historicalUserListTooltip: This list displays your anonymous accounts. You can click on an account to view its details. Anonymous accounts are created by clicking the 'Get Started' button
menu.openHistoricalUser: Click to open the anonymous account
menu.customPathPrompt: Storing the AppFlowy data folder in a cloud-synced folder such as Google Drive can pose risks. If the database within this folder is accessed or modified from multiple locations at the same time, it may result in synchronization conflicts and potential data corruption
menu.importAppFlowyData: Import Data from External AppFlowy Folder
menu.importingAppFlowyDataTip: Data import is in progress. Please do not close the app
menu.importAppFlowyDataDescription: Copy data from an external AppFlowy data folder and import it into the current AppFlowy data folder

menu.importFailed: Importing the AppFlowy data folder failed
